about.description: This website was developed in order for you to bless help others to keep clear of slander an defamation. Beyond user experience which we have kept in mind throughout the development process, we wanted to give you full control over your experience. You can add designations or expiration dste to your groups and many other options. We hope you'll enjoy and make the best out of what we offer.

preview.description: We've put together some of the main capabilities you can access. For more options and further introduction feel free to view all you can achieve by using the navigation bar fixed to the top of the page.

search.title: SEARCH
search.description: Here you can search through all existing groups and join them. You can search by title, date or designation
search.barLabel: Search for a group by title, date or designation
search.emptyGroupsLabel: There are currently no open groups
search.emptySearchResultsLabel: No groups could be found for

create.title: CREATE
create.description: Here you can create a new group. You can add designations or comments for future participants, desired expiration dste and much more customizations

title.label: Group Title
title.hint: Give a title to your group so other people can find it without the link
title.maxLengthError: Reading Title can contain only up to 50 characters

expirationDate.label: Reading Expiration Date
expirationDate.hint: You can give an expiration date to your group. Defaults to 30 days
expirationDate.invalidDateError: Expiration Date must be bigger than today
expirationDate.invalidDateFormatError: Expiration Date must be in date format

designations.label: Designations
designations.hint: You can add designations to your group (In memory of, health, success etc.)
designations.maxLengthError: Designation can contain only up to 50 characters

email.label: Email
email.hint: This email will be used only to send the links for your new group

summery.title: Reading summery
summery.description: See all who's taking part in this group, currently available segments and books, all with live updates. Look for a blinking dot indicating the book currently has available segments

select.title: Choose Segments For Current Book
select.description: Select a time frame by clicking on any time frame box you wish to choose, click again to undo selection. Once done, click on the done button below
select.hint: In case you don't see the time frame you wish to select, it has already been selected by someone else for this book, please wait for another shift to be opened and try again

nameField.label: Enter your name
nameField.hint: If you wish your name to appear in the group summery. Max 20 characters

confirmSelection.description: B-h I commit to keep clear from any speaking any slander or defamation in the time frame I've selected

success.title: Thank you, Your selection was successfully registered

notFound.title: Not Fount
notFound.description: The group requested could not be found. It might have expired and cannot be edited or viewed
